name: PACE Institute of Management
description: PACE Institute of Management is highly respected for the pioneer work through empowering businesses in their management and developing leaders at all levels so that businesses can grow strongly in local and global markets. PACE is well known for a comprehensive global partner system focus on management with eight affiliated schools (specializing in the fields of management, including general management, HR management, financial management, marketing management, sales management, production management, supply chain management, and project management), eight member companies (specializing in eight management areas), and twelve global partners (the world’s leading organizations in different management areas). Since the establishment, PACE’s mission has been to develop high-performance leaders and certified professionals for business and society.
features: Compensations are market-competitive and commensurate with the labor market
Get to work in a proactive, professional and friendly environment
Opportunities for promotion and career development
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Developing high-performance leaders and professionals for business and society.
ShortDescription: PACE Institute of Management is highly respected for the pioneer work through empowering businesses in their management and developing leaders at all levels so that businesses can grow strongly in local and global markets.
enhanced_description: PACE Institute of Management is a highly respected organization, established in 2001, specializing in empowering businesses and developing high-performance leaders and certified professionals for business and society. Their core mission is to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency across a comprehensive range of management disciplines. PACE offers specialized training in general management, HR management, financial management, marketing management, sales management, production management, supply chain management, and project management. A key strength of the institute is its extensive global partner system, which includes eight affiliated schools, eight member companies, and twelve global partners, all focused on various management areas.
key_use_cases: Developing certified professionals for business and society
Empowering businesses in human resources management
Empowering businesses in supply chain management
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency for businesses
Facilitating continuous learning and skill acquisition
competitive_advantages: Pioneer work in empowering businesses and developing leaders
Comprehensive global partner system with specialized affiliated schools, member companies, and global partners
roi_benefits: Strong business growth in local and global markets
